original_text: “Woe to you, Chorazin! Woe to you, Bethsaida! For if the mighty works done in you had been done in Tyre and Sidon, they would have repented long ago, sitting in sackcloth and ashes.
korean_text: 화 있을진저 고라신아, 화 있을진저 벳새다야, 너희에게 행한 모든 권능을 두로와 시돈에서 행하였더라면 그들이 벌써 베옷을 입고 재에 앉아 회개하였으리라

sentences.original_text: For if the mighty works done in you had been done in Tyre and Sidon,
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 너희에게서 행한 권능이 두로와 시돈에서 행하였더라면,

sentences.original_text: they would have repented long ago,
